column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: At about 10.50 on the night of August 15
column5: a Chinese man collapsed and died outside a massage parlor in Kbal Dam 2 village
column8: Phnom Penh.------According to people who witnessed the incident
column9: they first saw two Chinese men come to the scene and one entered the massage parlor but the victim did not accompany him. The man was walking around in the street when he collapsed. Shortly after an ambulance arrived but the man was already dead.------The dead man was identified as Chen Chaowen
column13: the authorities arrived and contacted the forensic expert
column14: who concluded cause of death was a heart attack.------ Post News
